resources.string: Here the joke will be displayed
Why doesn\'t the pine tree get lost in the forest?
" What did a pagodeiro do in the church?."
Why was Napoleon always called to parties? Because he was GOOD IN THE PARTY.
What is the king of cheese? It\'s the curd.
Por que a velhinha não usa relógio?\nPorque ela é senhora.
Quando os americanos comeram carne pela primeira vez?\nQuando chegou Cristovão Com Lombo.
" Why is the spider the most needy animal in the world? Because she is an aracneedyou."
